scripts.clean: rimraf terminal-*.js* && rimraf dist && rimraf xterm.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run server-build && npm run client-build && npm run dist-copy
scripts.dist-copy: cpx package.json ./dist && cpx ./node_modules/xterm/css/xterm.css ./dist && cpx terminal.pug ./dist && cpx terminal.html ./dist
scripts.dev-build: npm run clean && cpx ./node_modules/xterm/css/xterm.css ./ && npm run dev-server-build && npm run dev-client-build
